text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text: One day, Oguri Cap calls me to the<n>dance studio.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: You came...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I came up with some choreography<n>during my
dance lesson, but I can't<n>figure out what to do for
the chorus.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I'll show you what I've come up with so<n>far, so
please give me your honest<n>opinion.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: How was it?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Oguri-ness? Yeah, maybe that is what'smissing.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Thanks for the advice. So... What do you<n>think I
should do?
choice_data_list: Do you have a favorite dance move?
Do you have a favorite dance move?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: ...Actually, I do. It's called the banana<n>dance.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
I search for "banana dance" online, and a<n>video of
people dancing in festival coats<n>comes up.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. We'd do this dance at our festivals<n>back
home.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Every time I watch them all dancing to<n>the festival
music, it cheers me up.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
It might be a little unconventional for a<n>winning
concert, but I really like this<n>dance.
choice_data_list: Why not incorporate a few of its elements?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Good idea! Okay, show me that clip<n>again.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Which part do you like? I'll try and<n>incorporate it
into my choreography.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
You're right... Seeing them move like<n>that is super
energizing.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I like how they move after hitting the<n>taiko drums
as well. Maybe if we<n>combine the two...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Okay, that's perfect. All that's left for<n>me to do
now is practice.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
When Oguri Cap shows off her perfected<n>
choreography, she captivates everybody<n>
watching with her forceful movements.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Yeah... It's hard to take your eyes off<n>them.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I like how they move after hitting the<n>taiko drums
as well. Maybe if we<n>combine the two...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Okay, that's perfect. All that's left for<n>me to do
now is practice.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
When Oguri Cap shows off her perfected<n>
choreography, she captivates everybody<n>
watching with her graceful movements.
